item.title: Midsomer Murders Best Episodes List
item.description: The peacefulness of the Midsomer community is shattered by violent crimes, suspects are placed under suspicion, and it is up to a veteran DCI and his young sergeant to calmly and diligently eliminate the innocent and ruthlessly pursue the guilty. See the best episodes of Midsomer Murders below.

item.title: Best Episodes of Alfred Hitchcock Presents
item.description: Alfred Hitchcock Presents is an American television anthology series hosted by Alfred Hitchcock. The series featured dramas, thrillers, and mysteries. By the time the show premiered on October 2, 1955, Hitchcock had been directing films for over three decades. Time magazine named Alfred Hitchcock Presents one of The 100 Best TV Shows of All-TIME. A series of literary anthologies with the running title Alfred Hitchcock Presents were issued to capitalize on the success of the television series. One volume, devoted to stories that censors wouldn’t allow to be adapted for the TV series, was entitled Alfred Hitchcock Presents: Stories They Wouldn’t Let Me Do on TV—though eventually several of the stories collected were adapted. See the best episodes of Alfred Hitchcock below.

item.title: Best Perry Mason Episodes
item.description: The cases of master criminal defense attorney Perry Mason and his staff who handled the most difficult of cases in the aid of the innocent. Perry Mason is an American crime drama tv-series that was first aired in 1957. See the best episodes of Perry Mason Below.

item.title: Best Grey's Anatomy Episodes
item.description: Follows the personal and professional lives of a group of doctors at Seattle’s Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital. Grey’s Anatomy is an American drama tv-series that was first aired in 2005 on ABC. See the best episodes of Grey’s Anatomy below.

item.title: Best Episodes of Er
item.description: ER explores the inner workings of an urban teaching hospital and the critical issues faced by the dedicated physicians and staff of its overburdened emergency room. ER is an American drama tv-series that was first aired in 1994. See the best ER episodes below.

item.title: Best Riverdale Episodes
item.description: Set in the present, the series offers a bold, subversive take on Archie, Betty, Veronica and their friends, exploring the surreality of small-town life, the darkness and weirdness bubbling beneath Riverdale’s wholesome facade. Riverdale is an American crime drama tv-series that was first aired in 2017. See the best episodes of Riverdale below.

item.title: Dr. Phil Best Episodes
item.description: Using the power of television, Dr. Phil McGraw presents compelling stories about real people with a variety of emotional and behavioral problems, stripping away the shame and embarrassment that too often keep people from seeking help. Its a show that is suppose to help people with their problems and to find a solution on live TV. Dr. Phil is an American talk-show that was first aired in 2002 on OWN. See the best Dr. Phil episodes below.

item.title: Best Entourage Episodes
item.description: Film star Vince Chase navigates the vapid terrain of Los Angeles with a close circle of friends and his trusty agent. Entourage is an American comedy drama tv-series that was first aired in 2004 on HBO. See the best episodes of Entourage below.

item.title: Best Episodes of One Tree Hill
item.description: Set in the fictional small town of Tree Hill, North Carolina, this teen-driven drama tells the story of two half brothers, who share a last name and nothing else. Brooding, blue-collar Lucas is a talented street-side basketball player, but his skills are appreciated only by his friends at the river court. Popular, affluent Nathan basks in the hero-worship of the town, as the star of his high school team. And both boys are the son of former college ball player, Dan Scott, whose long ago choice to abandon Lucas and his mother Karen, will haunt him long into his life with wife Deb, and their son Nathan. One Tree Hill is an American romance drama tv-series that was first aired in 2003. See the best One Tree Hill episodes below.

item.title: Miami Vice Best Episodes
item.description: The story of the Miami Police Department’s vice squad and its efforts to end drug trafficking and prostitution, centered on the unlikely partnership of Sonny Crockett and Ricardo Tubbs - who first meet when Tubbs is undercover in a drug cartel. Miami Vice is an American drama, action & adventure tv-series that was first aired in 1984. See the best Miami Vice episodes below.

item.title: Best Episodes of Jersey Shore
item.description: Grab your hair gel, wax that Cadillac and get those tattooed biceps ready to fist pump with the best this summer at the Jersey Shore. MTV’s newest docu-soap exposes one of the tri-state area’s most misunderstood species, the Guido. Our Guidos and Guidettes will move into the ultimate beach house rental and indulge in everything the Seaside Heights, New Jersey scene has to offer. Beach by day, dancing and partying all night. They’ll live, work, and rage together until the summer ends. There’s no spray tan too orange, no hair too spiked, and no bod too tight for this crew. Jersey Shore is an American reality drama tv-series that was first aired in 2009. See the best Jersey Shore episodes below.

item.title: Best Episodes of Scrubs
item.description: In the unreal world of Sacred Heart Hospital, John ‘J.D.’ Dorian learns the ways of medicine, friendship and life. Scrubs is an American sitcom tv-series that was first aired in 2001. See the best Scrubs episodes below.

item.title: The Outer Limits Best Episodes (1995)
item.description: The Outer Limits is an anthology series of distinct story episodes, sometimes with a plot twist at the end. Unlike the original incarnation of the series, which was a pure anthology with each episode completely unrelated to the others, the revival series maintained an anthology format, but occasionally featured recurring story elements that were often tied together during season-finale clip shows. The Outer Limits is an American science horror anthology tv-series that was first aired in 1995. See the best episodes of The Outer Limits below.

item.title: Best Episodes of the Vampire Diaries
item.description: The story of two vampire brothers obsessed with the same girl, who bears a striking resemblance to the beautiful but ruthless vampire they knew and loved in 1864. The Vampire Diaries is an American teen romance supernatural tv-series that was first aired in 2009. See The Vampire Diaries best episodes below.

item.title: Best Episodes of Bones
item.description: Dr. Temperance Brennan and her colleagues at the Jeffersonian’s Medico-Legal Lab assist Special Agent Seeley Booth with murder investigations when the remains are so badly decomposed, burned or destroyed that the standard identification methods are useless. See the best Bones episodes below.

item.title: Best Episodes of Shameless
item.description: Chicagoan Frank Gallagher is the proud single dad of six smart, industrious, independent kids, who without him would be… perhaps better off. When Frank’s not at the bar spending what little money they have, he’s passed out on the floor. But the kids have found ways to grow up in spite of him. They may not be like any family you know, but they make no apologies for being exactly who they are. See the best Shameless episodes below.

item.title: Best Kuwtk Episodes
item.description: A peek inside the exploits and privileged private lives of the blended Kardashian-Jenner family, including sisters Kim, Kourtney and Khloé. See the best episodes of Kuwtk below.

item.title: Best Episodes of Monk
item.description: Adrian Monk was once a rising star with the San Francisco Police Department, legendary for using unconventional means to solve the department’s most baffling cases. But after the tragic (and still unsolved) murder of his wife Trudy, he developed an extreme case of obsessive-compulsive disorder. Now working as a private consultant, Monk continues to investigate cases in the most unconventional ways. See best Monk episodes below.

item.title: Best Intervention Episodes
item.description: People whose uncontrollable addiction to drugs, alcohol or compulsive behavior has brought them to the brink of destruction and has devastated their family and friends are presented with a life-changing opportunity of intervention and rehab. Each addict must confront their darkest demons in order to begin their journey to recovery in the hopes that they can turn their lives around before it’s too late. See best episodes of Intervention series below.

item.title: Best Episodes of Law and Order
item.description: Follows a crime (usually a murder), usually adapted from current headlines, from two separate vantage points, the police investigation and the prosecution in court. Law and Order is an American police and legal drama tv series that was first premiered in 1990. See the best Law and Order episodes below to binge-watch on.

item.title: The Mentalist Best Episodes
item.description: Patrick Jane, a former celebrity psychic medium, uses his razor sharp skills of observation and expertise at “reading” people to solve serious crimes with the California Bureau of Investigation. See the best episodes of The Mentalist below.

item.title: Best Criminal Minds Episodes
item.description: An elite team of FBI profilers analyze the country’s most twisted criminal minds, anticipating their next moves before they strike again. The Behavioral Analysis Unit’s most experienced agent is David Rossi, a founding member of the BAU who returns to help the team solve new cases. See the best episodes of Criminal Minds below.
